sn4.19:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagava bhikkhunam nibbanapatisamyuttaya dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
sn4.19:1.3: Te ca bhikkhu atthim katva manasi katva sabbacetasa samannaharitva ohitasota dhammam sunanti.
sn4.19:2.2: “ayam kho samano gotamo bhikkhunam nibbanapatisamyuttaya dhammiya kathaya …pe…
sn4.19:2.3: yannunaham yena samano gotamo tenupasankameyyam vicakkhukammaya”ti.
sn4.19:2.4: Atha kho maro papima kassakavannam abhinimminitva mahantam nangalam khandhe karitva dighapacanayatthim gahetva hatahatakeso sanasatinivattho kaddamamakkhitehi padehi yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn4.19:2.7: “Mameva, samana, cakkhu, mama rupa, mama cakkhusamphassavinnanayatanam.
sn4.19:2.13: mameva, samana, mano, mama dhamma, mama manosamphassavinnanayatanam.
sn4.19:3.1: “Taveva, papima, cakkhu, tava rupa, tava cakkhusamphassavinnanayatanam.
sn4.19:3.2: Yattha ca kho, papima, natthi cakkhu, natthi rupa, natthi cakkhusamphassavinnanayatanam, agati tava tattha, papima.
sn4.19:3.3: Taveva, papima, sotam, tava sadda, tava sotasamphassavinnanayatanam.
sn4.19:3.4: Yattha ca kho, papima, natthi sotam, natthi sadda, natthi sotasamphassavinnanayatanam, agati tava tattha, papima.
sn4.19:3.5: Taveva, papima, ghanam, tava gandha, tava ghanasamphassavinnanayatanam.
sn4.19:3.6: Yattha ca kho, papima, natthi ghanam, natthi gandha, natthi ghanasamphassavinnanayatanam, agati tava tattha, papima.
sn4.19:3.7: Taveva, papima, jivha, tava rasa, tava jivhasamphassavinnanayatanam …pe…
sn4.19:3.8: taveva, papima, kayo, tava photthabba, tava kayasamphassavinnanayatanam …pe…
sn4.19:3.9: taveva, papima, mano, tava dhamma, tava manosamphassavinnanayatanam.
sn4.19:3.10: Yattha ca kho, papima, natthi mano, natthi dhamma, natthi manosamphassavinnanayatanam, agati tava tattha, papima”ti.
